Package src.cube3X3

Class RubiksCube3X3

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.cube.RubiksCube
      • src.cube3X3.RubiksCube3X3
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RubiksCubeInterface
    public class RubiksCube3X3
extends RubiksCube
    Provides implementation of RubiksCube class to perform all operations on 3X3 RubiksCube
    Since:
    JDK 10.0.2

        public java.lang.String rotateFront​(boolean direction)

        Parameters:
        direction - for directions R_CLK,R_ANTICLK rotation is performed on Front layer of the cube in clkwise,anticlkwise direction respectively

        String
